name: Daten und Gesundheit
goal: The goal of the Association is to promote the debate on the collection, storage and use of individual medical and health data in Switzerland. This includes the analysis and discussion of the scientific, ethical, societal, legal and political aspects of the use of personal health data for personal health and medical research.
euInitiatives:
Horizon 2020
mobile Health
Personalized Medicine
Innovation principle
Innovative medicines initiatives
Data protection regulation
Consent law in medical research
Forms of dynamic consent for data use in research
